name: Jumbo
spokenText: Feel free to browse. I'll buy anything you have on you. If you're interested in my Gnome, Lumpy is just 1000gp.

name: Mayor Quellando
spokenText: Who are you? Get out of my house.

name: Angry Gnome
spokenText: Who are you? What do you want? Sounds pretty stupid to me.

name: Mining Gnome
spokenText: Yes? I'm a little busy mining here.

name: Ugly Gnome
spokenText: Hello. Please don't look at me.

name: Strange Man
spokenText: One, two, travel true, one, one, don't run, three, three, almost free, two, two, and you're through.

name: Grumpy Knight
spokenText: I won't let anyone pass unless they're better than me at swords and stuff.

name: Stupid Dwarf
spokenText: Hello. Do you have any cheese? I'd be eternally grateful.

name: Friendly Dwarf
spokenText: Hello. I'd love a job, if you could give me one.

name: Tholdbur the Dwarf
spokenText: Hello. I hear you are looking for a useful helper.

name: Dwarny
spokenText: Hello. I am a true dwarf, capable of carrying untold amounts of ore faster than any other. For a one time fee, I'll work for you.
